name: Hell Fair
description:
This game was a submission for the 2022 Global Game Jam.

Welcome to the annual fair in Šabac! This year, the most popular carnival stand lets you shoot devils with your favourite shotgun. But be careful! The other side of each devil is an angel and an angel can also be a devil. Shoot as many devils as you can while sparring the angels. Make sure to utilise the duality of each target.

More info on the game's GGJ page: Hell Fair.
